titleStmt.title: Psychosophia or, Natural & divine contemplations of the passions & faculties of the soul of man. In three books. By Nicholas Mosley, Esq;
titleStmt.author: Mosley, Nicholas, 1611-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Mosley at the Prince's Arms St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Each of the "three books" is preceded by a dedication.
Signatures: A a⁴ B-H ² A⁴ J-O P1-3 *² P4-8 Q-S.
Running title reads: Natural & divine contemplations of the soul of man.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
The first word of the title is in Greek characters.

place.placeName: the Prince's Arms St. Paul's Church-yard
